title: Design & Sim of Voting Influence
description: Blockchain DAOs, including Catalyst, are governed by one coin - one vote policy which is susceptible to oligarchic control.

title: Catalyst Compass
description: It is becoming apparent that it is too difficult or even impossible for the average voter to make a good projects selection for voting.

title: Cardano Smart Voting
description: It's becoming harder to vote on the many proposals. Let's provide an easy mechanism for users to vote quickly based on their interests.

title: Consenz: A Virtual Parliament App
description: Discussions regarding the future of Cardano & Catalyst are spread around many platforms and are disconnected from the voting process.

title: Distributed Work-Reward Mechanism
description: Rewarding intangible work in a DAO is not transparent or scalable. There is too much focus on $ allocation before contribution attribution.

title: Catalyst Interactive News Journal
description: Community members have no way to be rewarded for contributing stories of their Catalyst journeys, and voting on the contributions of others

title: Catalyst: Exploratory Data Analysis
description: Catalyst already generates lots of data (voting results, advisors scores...) that are not being used to bring value to the process.

title: Community Tools Maintenance/Updates
description: Catalyst is constantly changing and evolving. Without maintenance and updates, useful Community Tools will become outdated and useless.

title: Voter Tool - AIM
description: Voter's access to information about proposals and assessments is limited and not presented in a user-friendly way.

title: Connecting Asian Voters & Proposers
description: There are barriers, such as a lack of trusted information to voting caused by language differences & cultural exclusivity.

title: Catalyst QA Automation scripts
description: The Catalyst QA stage changes every Fund according to the will of the community. Time and energy is needed to keep it up-to-date.

title: Improve the Quality of CA Reviews
description: The competitive nature of Catalyst is impacting the quality of CA reviews.

title: Stake Pool Operators Video Series
description: Stake pool operators (SPOs) should be household names but 2500+ SPOs wrestle to retain+grow pools+connect meaningfully with global audiences

title: Testing MyVoice MVP in Catalyst
description: Catalyst needs a place to test "reputation profiles" before implementation

title: Distributed Collaboration Protocol
description: Cardano will bring contributors at a rapidly growing rate. A rigid approach to collaboration will be unsustainable and inefficient at scale.

title: Oversight of Catalyst Circle
description:
Catalyst Circle requires independent oversight.

A community maintained oversight of Catalyst Circle requires support to be sustainable.

title: Catalyst Proposals Assessment Guide
description: Approximately 89% could not evaluate the proposals in Catalyst to Vote.

title: Cardano Catalyst TV
description: Voters do not have time to read all the proposals worth voting for and proposers do not have much credibility and reputable to reach voters.

title: 2Min Review
description: Vietnamese stakeholders have difficulties to read, understand and evaluate submitted proposals in project Catalyst.

title: Power Up The Catalyst Circle
description: Without a budget to fund its operation, Catalyst Circle can't produce meaningful outcomes.
